item.title: From Chaos To Structure: My AI Development Journey
item.description: Picture this: It’s 7 AM, you’re on your first cup of coffee, and you’ve just discovered that your AI model can quickly help you explore an idea to establish whether it’s worth exploring further. Do you stop to write a formal specification, or do you ride the wave of discovery? Over the past year, I’ve lived in both worlds—the exhilarating chaos of AI experimentation and the structured discipline of traditional software design.
